00035 struct b2RevoluteJointDef : public b2JointDef
00036 {
00037         b2RevoluteJointDef()
00038         {
00039                 type = e_revoluteJoint;
00040                 localAnchorA.Set(0.0f, 0.0f);
00041                 localAnchorB.Set(0.0f, 0.0f);
00042                 referenceAngle = 0.0f;
00043                 lowerAngle = 0.0f;
00044                 upperAngle = 0.0f;
00045                 maxMotorTorque = 0.0f;
00046                 motorSpeed = 0.0f;
00047                 enableLimit = false;
00048                 enableMotor = false;
00049         }
